title: Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: An Inquiry Into Values
description: 1974. Reprinted. 412 pages. Illustrated dust jacket over brown cloth covered boards with gilt. Pages remain clear with minimal tanning and foxing. Text block edge is moderately foxed. Damp staining to paste downs. Front free end paper excised. Binding remains firm. Cracking to hinges, no damage to end papers. Boards have moderate edge-wear with bumping to corners and rubbing to surfaces. Mild crushing to spine ends with small splits. Book has a slight forward lean. Gilt lettering is bright and clear. Cloth has minor damp and dust stains. Clipped jacket has moderate edge-wear with chips, tears and creasing.
author: Robert M. Pirsig
